item.description:
Hi everyone!

We will be going to see the new Harry Potter movie; Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows part 1 on December 4th 2010 at 12:45pm. If you would like to join I STRONGLY recommend you purchase you tickets in advance online since they will likely sellout . If you have kids feel free to bring them as well.

This is a single, couples, and family friendly event.

You can follow the link to purchase movie tickets online
http://imaxtixs.easyt...

There is a Fuddruckers there so we can have an early lunch prior to the movie starting at 12:45pm if interested. I will be the the restaurant at 11:30a so feel free to come and meet us.

Make sure to RSVP if you would like to attend!

Looking forward to meeting up,

Russ
414 217 2145
item.how_to_find_us: I will dress to impress so you can pick me out of the crowd.
item.name: Go see a Movie- Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
